title: No Bot Response
description:
If ModMail is not responding in your server, please check the following:
- The bot has Read Messages, Send Messages, and Embed Links permissions.
- You are using the correct prefix.
 - Use `@ModMail prefix` to check the prefix.
- The command you are using is valid.
 - Check using `=help <command>`.
- The bot is online. Discord might be having issues, or the bot might be restarting.
- If the bot still does respond, please let us know your [server ID](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-User-Server-Message-ID-).
